content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a divorce case that took place in the family court the case lasted for a year and involved a group insurance policy purchased during the marriage the judge reviewed the status of the insurance policy and determined that the benefits accrued during the marriage should be considered joint property and subject to liquidation the text mentions the involvement of mr d and mrs a as the parties in the case it discusses the arguments made by both parties regarding the insurance policy and the calculation of the amount to be allocated the court addressed objections raised by mrs a and made rulings based on the evidence and legal arguments presented the text also mentions the involvement of notaries in the liquidation process and the reopening of debates on the issue of withholding tax further proceedings have been scheduled
